description: Versatile shorts designed to perform and protect on or off water with built-in UPF 50 and advanced water-and-stain repellency. Angler-friendly features include just-right stretch fabric, a zip-closed security pocket, hand and back pockets, a reinforced pliers pocket, and a utility loop.
name: Columbia Sportswear Blood And Guts Stretch Shorts, 8" Inseam - Mens
